Class LevelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
      • LevelController

  • public class LevelController
extends Controller
    Controls the level scene.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Josiah Richards

      void initialize()
      The initialize called automatically by javafx.
      void loadLevel(int mapID)
      Loads a map with a given ID into mapMain.
      boolean loadMap()
      Loads the selected map, continuing with a save if the save exists and the option is set.
      void loadSave(int profileID, int mapID)
      Loads the save for a given map and profile ID into map main.
      void lose()
      Handle the player losing, play a sound and restart the map.
      void manualInitialize()
      An initialize that we call manually a bit later than the automatic javafx initialize when all the variables are ready.
      void processKeyEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handle a key press, moving the player.
      void redraw()
      Redraws the UI.
      void renderMap()
      Renders the mapMain
      void renderStats()
      Displays all the items in the players inventory, the current tokens collected and the current time taken on the UI.
      void restart()
      Tries to restarts the level, if the map couldn't be loaded it returns to the select level scene.
      void setCurHintText(java.lang.String curHintText)
      Changes the current hint text.
      void win()
      Handle the player winning.

        Changes the current hint text.
        Parameters:
        curHintText - The new hunt text.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Tries to restarts the level, if the map couldn't be loaded it returns to the select level scene.

      • loadMap

        public boolean loadMap()
        Loads the selected map, continuing with a save if the save exists and the option is set.
        Returns:
        If the map loaded successfully or not.

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel(int mapID)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      ParsingException
        Loads a map with a given ID into mapMain.
        Parameters:
        mapID - The map ID to load.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the map file couldn't be found.
        ParsingException - If the map file couldn't be parsed.

      • loadSave

        public void loadSave(int profileID,
                     int mapID)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     ParsingException
        Loads the save for a given map and profile ID into map main.
        Parameters:
        profileID - The profile ID who's save we want to load.
        mapID - The map ID of the map we want to load.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the save file couldn't be found.
        ParsingException - If the save file couldn't be parsed.

      • lose

        public void lose()
        Handle the player losing, play a sound and restart the map.

      • win

        public void win()
        Handle the player winning. Updates the highscores and highest level the player has won before sending them to the next level.

        Handle a key press, moving the player.
        Parameters:
